LANG_INTRO_ENCRYPTMESSAGE.value: It may ensure secure communication by encrypting the messages between chat server and chat client with private-public key pair using RSA algorithm. It is essential when users are required to supply a password, bank account details or other confidential information in your chat room.Note:it is required to restart your chat server after you have this module enabled.

LANG_INTRO_EVENTCHAT.value: With this module, each chat room can be scheduled to automatically open and close. This is a great way to attract more traffic to your chat room and to stimulate high-quality conversation.

LANG_INTRO_BUDDYLIST.value: It allows the registered users to add other chat users to their friend list which can help them to get their friends' online/offline status information and have a private chat with them. The friend list is located beside userlist.

LANG_INTRO_INVISIBLEADMIN.value: It entitles the administrators to monitor chat conversation invisibly, meanwhile the admin can still talk in the lobby or in private chat, and kick annoyance out. Without the visible presence of the Admin, the chat users feel free to talk but in fact they can't go too far.

LANG_INTRO_CHANGENICKNAME.value: It allows the users to change their nickname in conversation to cover their real identities for fun or for security reason. It also offers the ability to manage user profile including the following items: location, age, sex and avatar picture.

LANG_INTRO_AVATARCHATMODULE.value: It turns 123FlashChat to a graphical chat program in addition to the text chat, the characters can walk around in the virtual environment to meet people and chat with them. It provides a more fun, easy and friendly chat experience. Avatar chat will surely make the members stick to your website.

To learn more about the integration, click the link below.

LANG_LIVEHELP_EDIT_ERROR.value: 123LiveHelp server is not started or installed.

LANG_SOFTWARE_LIVEHELP_LABEL.value: The First Free Live Help Chat Server Software enhanced with Video Function.The product allows you the ability to offer online instant help for the visitors of your website, and convert them into buyers through effective and instant online communication. Increase your revenue with 123LiveHelp now!

LANG_SOFTWARE_WEBMESSENGER_LABEL.value: Web-Based Instant Messaging Software enhanced with Video Option.The product could create a unique IM network only for your own website, it can be fully integrated with your existing user database and enables one-to-one chat function on your website. Build a chat community for a user-based website with 123 Web Messenger now!

LANG_INTRODUCTION_COMMON.value: The following parameters are needed to integrate your database that needs to be accessed via Common with 123 Flash Chat.

LANG_GAME_LABEL_TEXT.value: You wanna stick users to your chat room? Let them play games, game is the most favorite activity for most users. 123FlashChat embedded hundreds of cool games for your users' choice, and the best is: they are totally free. In this panel, you can activate the game feature, and you can also set which room could use this feature in this room's Basic setting tab. Activate game and activate the users' passion for your chat.

LANG_FONT_ERROR_SAME.value: Duplicated font size cannot be added.

LANG_SAVE_SUCCESS_RESTART.value: Configuration is saved, please restart your chat server to take into effect.

LANG_WEBMESSENGER_TEXT.value: 123WebMessenger is TopCMM's real-time instant messaging software which can be integrated with your user-info database to enable live communication on your web. And with it integrated with 123FlashChat, it will allow the bilateral communication between your 123WebMessenger and 123FlashChat: 123WebMessenger users could send messages to 123FlashChat users and 123FlashChat users could manage their 123WebMessenger users as well.

LANG_WEBMESSENGER_EDIT_ERROR.value: 123WebMessenger server is not restarted or installed.

LANG_VIDEO_USER_STOP.value: User can click the icon of the users who is speaking to turn off the audio when broadcasting audio.

LANG_PROFILE_INTRODUCTION.value: If you want to pop up Edit Profile panel for guests when they log in or you only want users to edit their avatars without profile entries(such as birthday, gender and email,etc.), please set in this panel.If you leave the "Pop up Edit Profile panel for the guest whose name is initialized" with field blank, the system will make it available for all guests. And if you fill this field with a word (let's call it A), only the guest who login in the form of init_A will receive the pop up Edit Profile panel.

LANG_SHOARED_ACCESSURL_INTRODUCTION.value: You may define the URL of your chat room here or leave it blank, so the default address will be http://yourdomain/123flashchat.html.

LANG_ROOM_ACCESSURL_INTRODUCTION.value: Define direct access URL for this specific chat room, which will appear in the invitation message, or leave it blank to use the default address: http://yourdomain/123flashchat.html.

LANG_EXTERNAL_HTML_INTRODUCTION.value: External advertising (Google Ads) will help you add Google AD at the bottom of your chat, if you need to launch such an AD, please check the Enable external HTML box first and then paste the AD code in the textbox below and click Save and Generate Code button, then you will be redirected to another panel, in that panel, you may click the Copy button and paste the code in the clipboard to embed a chat in combination with your Google AD in a page.

LANG_INTRODUCTION_LIVESHOW.value: Activate the Live Show module in a specific room to convert all the conversation from certain user groups to scrolling content in a special read-only chat client. A room can't become a Live Show room under the following circumstances: a. The Live Show module is not purchased and enabled yet. b. It's a password-protected room. c. It's a member-only room. d. it is a PPM/PPV room.

LANG_SEND_FILE_TO_YOU.value: %SENDER% is sending a file to you

LANG_FORUM_AND_CMS_POST_NOTIFIER_INTRODU.value: With it, 123 Flash Chat rooms can integrate with forums, CMS systems (such as phpBB, vBulletin, IPB, Joomla and so on). Therefore users in the chat room will get message alert for each new post or new reply in the forum or CMS. It helps the webmaster to integrate the entire site all in one, and meanwhile helps the chat users to be practically kept posted with the dynamic update of the site.

LANG_FORUM_AND_CMS_POST_NOTIFIER_INTERVA.value: Frequency of sending a message (1 minute)

LANG_EDIT_FORUM_AND_CMS_POST_NOTIFIER_NO.value: Forum And Cms Post Notifier is not activated.

LANG_INTRODUCTION_LOGO.value: Max size: 240px*40px. Supported formats: SWF, JPEG, GIF and PNG. If animated GIF, only the first frame will show. And for PNG or GIF, please make sure the chat client and the logo are on the same domain.

LANG_FONTSIZE_TOO_LARGE.value: The font size is out of range.

LANG_FORUM_AND_CMS_POST_NOTIFIER_NOTES.value: Note: Besides you make correct configurations in the admin panel, you also need to set the corresponding settings in the forum or cms for this module.

LANG_MSNBOI_ENABLE_FIX.value: MSN robot is not bound, if you need to add new MSN robots, please click OK to go to the Remote Controller Module panel under Module Settings to set your MSN robots.

LANG_CODE_GENERATE_INTRODUCE.value: An HTML room list can be your Flash chat room preview.

LANG_ROOM_CHAT_BOT_INTRODUCE.value: You may add automatic messages with certain font style, size, color and time intervals, which will be sent periodically as system messages.

LANG_ROOM_LIVE_HELP_INTRODUCE.value: If you want to use it, you should activate and integrate 123LiveHelp in the Integrate 123LiveHelp panel. 123LiveHelp could help your company provide real-time online support for your customers. And with it integrated with 123FlashChat, the customers in your chat will have another way to find help for their problems and your operators will find another way to access your customers and provide them the help they need.

LANG_ROOM_AUDIO_VIDEO_INTRODUCE.value: It enables users to talk face-to-face with friends and loved ones using webcam, or take part in video conference or seminars.

LANG_ROOM_WHITE_BOARD_INTRODUCE.value: You can draw during chat, and all the other users in the same room can view the drawing or join you.

LANG_TOOLTIP_LICENSE_LIMITATION.value: It denotes the limits on number of concurrent users login the 123 flash chat.

LANG_TOOLTIP_LICENSE_OWNER.value: It denotes who is the legal owner of the 123 Flash Chat License.

LANG_TOOLTIP_LICENSE_EMAIL.value: It also denotes the legal owner of the 123 Flash Chat License. This is the registered Email in the TopCMM system. You can get after-sale services by this email.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BASIC_ENABLEPRIVATECHAT.value: Enable private chat either through left click or right click a username in the user list.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BASIC_VISIBLE_TIMESTAMP.value: The timestamp will show in front of the username of each message.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BASIC_ENABLE_WHISPER.value: Private chat in the lobby instead of a floating chat window. Whisper between two users cannot be heard by the third party.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BASIC_OPEN_ADVERTISINGBANNE.value: Only buyer users can enjoy using this function.

LANG_TOOLTIP_ROOM_TURN_ON_MODERATOR.value: When you enable this function, the messages sent by the users in the current room need to be approved by the moderator. That is to say, the moderator have the right to filter messages.

LANG_TOOLTIP_ROOM_MODERATOR.value: Administrators and super administrators both can assign a user as moderator. The moderator must be a registered user and his or her power is granted by the administrator or super administrator.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BASIC_OPEN_PREDEFINEMESSAGE.value: When you check it, the predefined messages button will appear in the toolbar of the client chat window. The users can do those things via it: 1)Send predefined messages. 2)Add and delete predefined messages. 3)Show predefined messages with pagination.

LANG_TOOLTIP_ROOM_MESSAGE_INTERVAL.value: Here, you can set the time interval between a message and its next message for chat bot

LANG_TOOLTIP_SYS_NUMBTIME.value: Here, you can set the time period for a kicked-out user's next logging in this room.

LANG_TOOLTIP_SYS_MUTE_AUTO_ENABLE.value: When this function is enabled, the user (guest user, registered user or speaker) cannot send the same message for four times, or she/he will be muted.

LANG_TOOLTIP_ROOM_SEQUENCE.value: When you change number here, its order will be changed in the room list of the client-end.

LANG_TOOLTIP_SYS_MAXCONNECT.value: Here, the administrator can set the max concurrent users of the system. Its max value can not exceed the value limited by your license.

LANG_TOOLTIP_SYS_FILTER_REPLACE.value: First, you set a sign (such as asterisk) to replace the filtered word in the first blank.Second, you input the inappropriate words in the second blank field and click Add, all inappropriate words will be kept in the third blank field like 'fuck' and 'shit'.

LANG_TOOLTIP_SYS_MUTE_ENABLE.value: Mute, to refrain offensive users from speaking by the management team (super admin, admin or moderator).

LANG_IDLE_SETTING_INTRODUCTION.value: Convert idle status for a length of time to disconnection. Default value: 0, meaning no disconnection, no kicking.

LANG_FORUM_AND_CMS_POST_NOTIFIER_TIPTEXT.value: (a value of zero indicates that there is no limit)

LANG_CODE_GENERATE_INTRODUCE_NOTE.value: If you've installed the chat client under your own HTTP server, firstly, open <123FlashChat installed directory>/server/etc/groups/default/server.xml, find: <client documentRoot=">, and change the value to the absolute path of the chat client folder on the HTTP server.

LANG_ROOM_AVATAR_CHAT_INTRODUCE.value: You can decide whether to enable the Avatar chat module, meanwhile, you can also set scenes for it. In this chat module, text chat room can be transformed to avatar chat in which you can walk around to "meet people" and gossip with them.

LANG_TOOLTIP_ROOM_SPEAKER.value: Administrators and super administrators both can assign a user as speaker here.The speaker must be a registered user and his or her power is granted by the administrator or super administrator.

LANG_TOOLTIP_BANDWIDTH_DESCRIPTION.value: The maximum output bandwidth, expressed in KB/S. The formula to get a right video output bandwidth: video window width * video window height * frame rate (FPS)/8/1024= output bandwidth (KB/S). If output bandwidth=0, that means unlimited output bandwidth can be used for the paticular Flash video

LANG_ENABLE_TO_UPLOAD_AVATAR_HELP.value: You don't need to set it up to use

LANG_CUSTOM_AVATAR_DEFAULT_ADDRESS_HELP.value: It will work well without any setting changes

LANG_SUBMIT_TICKET_DETAIL.value: Buy a license to edit this message

LANG_AFFILIATE_DETAIL.value: Details about how to get an Affiliate ID

LANG_INTEGRATION_URL_DETAIL.value: Detail about how to write your own login chat script

LANG_DISPLAY_AVATAR_IN_INPUT_PANEL.value: Display avatar in the input area

LANG_DISPLAY_AVATAR_IN_INPUT_PANEL_HELP.value: If the "avatar type" in the chat theme panel is defined as "no avatar", or the width of the input area is less than 200px, then the avatar won't show.

LANG_CUSTOM_AVATAR_UPLOAD_URL_HELP.value: It is the file address used to store and deal with the images uploaded by users. If you use 123FlashChat HTTP server, please leave it empty. Supported formats are *.jpg, *.jpeg, *.gif, *.png, *.bmp.

LANG_CUSTOM_AVATAR_DOWNLOAD_URL_HELP.value: The address should be HTTP URL,which corresponds to upload images stored in the server root directory.If you use 123FlashChat HTTP server,please leave it empty.Supported formats:*.jpg,*.jpeg,*.gif,*.png,*.bmp.

LANG_CUSTOM_AVATAR_SETTING_INTRODUCTION.value: If integrate avatar to 123FlashChat with parameter lckavt, when lckavt=0, it means avatar can be changed, or the avatar can’t be changed.

LANG_INTRO_LIVESHOW.value: With Live Show, the users outside the chat room may also be allowed to view the live chat, this would be especially useful if you need to put a chat demo to attract potential users or have a chat room whose live chat content can be seen by outside users.

LANG_CUSTOM_AVATAR_SETTING_MODULE_INTROD.value: This module enables chat users to have unique avatars by uploading images or capturing webcam video in an avatar editing panel.It is a great way to get traffic and create quality chat content.

LANG_POPUP_CHANGE_AVATAR_WHEN_USER_NOT_S.value: Popup the Change Avatar panel for users who haven't configured avatars yet when he/she enters a room

LANG_UPLOAD_IMAGE_FILE_SIZE.value: The max upload file size of image

LANG_POPUP_CHANGE_AVATAR_WHEN_USER_NOT_S.value: If it meets the conditions to popup both the Edit profile panel and the Change Avatar panel, then only the previous one will popup because it has higher priority than the latter one.

LANG_LINK_URL_HELP.value: Enter link URL here so that when users click the video,it will direct them there.

LANG_MEDIA_URL_HELP.value: The URL of the media files(FLV,MP3 or YouTube)you want to play in the current room,it should be absolute URL initiates with http,or relative URL if the file is located in the same directory of 123flashchat.swf.

LANG_ENABLE_POPUP_PROFILE_PANEL_HELP.value: Check it so that the profile panel will pop up when mouse over his/her username in the user list

LANG_ENABLE_POPUP_PROFILE_PANEL.value: Pop up profile panel when mouse over user name in user list

LANG_BUY_FLASHCHAT.value: Buy a license to edit this message

LANG_VIEW_VISIBLE_CHANGEROOMCOMBOBOX.value: Show room list tab besides the user list

LANG_INTRODUCTION_MYSQL.value: If you need to integrate your MySQL database, please select MySQL and click Edit, fill in the required fields and click OK, the users recorded in you MySQL database then could conveniently log in your chat without re-entering their username or password.

LANG_GRFT_LOOP_SETTINGS_HELP.value: It defines how many credits will be consumed for showing in the loop gifts panel each time. Eg., value=2 means if the gift worths 10 credits, then the gift will show 10/2=5 times there.

Lang_COMPARE_CREIDTS.value: Credits awards value must be less than credits value

LANG_SAME_CATEGORY_ERROR.value: This category has been in our database, please change another one

LANG_CATEGORY_NULL.value: Category can not be empty, please select a category

LANG_INCOMING_CREIDTS_RANGE.value: The value of the commission must be smaller than that of the Credits Per Unit.

LANG_SAME_USER_NAME_ERROR.value: The same user name already exists

LANG_SETTINGS_ERROR.value: The setting of your server has been changed failed!

LANG_ADVERTISINGBANNER_ERROR_FREEMODE.value: The advertising section can't be editted in the free version.

LANG_GIFT_INTRODUCTION.value: Activate virtual gifts mode and users have to pay credits to buy gifts and send to each other, which is a great way to generate revenue.

LANG_PPM_INTRODUCTION.value: You can activate PPM module , including PPM Room and PPM Video , which will bring more fun to your chat room .

LANG_LOGIN_HELP.value: Login website buychatcredits.com to check the credit change history. The login and password will be popped up once you have activated the Virtual Currency Credits Service.

LANG_AUTO_PLAY_GIFT_TO_OTHERS.value: Auto play the gifts for others

LANG_AUTO_PLAY_GIFT_TO_ME.value: Auto play the gifts for receivers

LANG_COMPARE_CREIDTS.value: Commission should be less than credits

LANG_INTRODUCTION_DETAIL.value: The credits service must be activated first, and it is based on a billing system. %BR%Your first option is our paid service to link to your current billing system, then the second one is the free service our BCC website offered. %BR%The credits service is enabled for the trial version too, however, it's only for testing purpose and the chat owner won't get revenue from it. %BR%Furthermore, you can define the payment method and cash credit ratio here.

LANG_MODERATOR_VIDEO_CANSHUTD_HELP.value: If checking this option, users can stop moderator watching their videos. Or moderator can watch any user’ video without interruption.

LANG_ADMIN_VIDEO_CANSHUTD_HELP.value: Users can stop admin watching their video.

LANG_INCOMING_CREDITS_HELP.value: The total credits room host can get from users who watch the PPM video.

LANG_CREDITS_HELP.value: Credits amount each time or minute, according to following choice of the PPM Video Type.

LANG_USER_NAME_HELP.value: The username of room host, who can publish PPM video in the current chat room.

LANG_SAME_GIFT_NAME_ERROR.value: Gift name must be unique in the same category.

LANG_PPM_VIDEO_TYPE_HELP.value: Pay Per Minute/Time, users will pay per minute or per time to watch the video chat session.

LANG_USER_NAME_COLOR_SAME_WITH_MESSAGE_C.value: Synchronize the username color when the message color is changed

LANG_PAMENT_NULL.value: At least one payment option needs to be retained

LANG_SAME_CREDITS_ERROR.value: This credit price already exists, please add a new one.

LANG_ACTIVE_THE_PANEL.value: You can not enable this panel until you have actived it.

LANG_VIDEO_HEIGHT_ERROR.value: Integer number, video window height must be greater than 120.

LANG_CASH_MAX_VALUE_ERROR.value: Cash amount can not be larger than 10,000,000,000,000

LANG_CASH_MIN_VALUE_ERROR.value: Cash amount should be larger than 1

LANG_AUTO_OPEN_VIDEO_HELP.value: Enable opening the PPM video automatically as soon as the chat user enters the chat room.

LANG_PUBLISH_VIDEO_AUTOMATIC_HELP.value: If the host user is broadcasting, then his/her video window will automatically open to any user who enters the current room.

LANG_ROOM_INCOMING_CREDITS_HELP.value: Integer number. The room host will get as many credits as a user has to pay when entering the PPM room.

LANG_ROOM_USER_NAME_HELP.value: Enter a username. The user in the chat room will get credits as a commission when a user enters the PPM room

LANG_PPM_ROOM_TYPE_HELP.value: Pay Per Minute/Time, users will pay per minute or per time to enter the room.

LANG_CREDITS_AWARDS_HELP.value: The increased credits the receiver will get after accepting gifts.

LANG_GIFT_THUMBNAIL_URL_HELP.value: The supported formats of gift thumbnail URL are: SWF/.PNG/.JPG/.GIF. Standard file size:58*58 pixels

LANG_GIFT_LOADING_URL_HELP.value: The Animation URL of gift animation, supported format is SWF，which needs flash player 9.0 or above version.

LANG_GIFT_DURATION_HELP.value: The duration of the gift broadcasts in the chat room.

LANG_GIFT_ACTIVE_HELP.value: Do you want to active this gift? If no, the gift will be hidden in the chat gift panel.

LANG_NUMBER_FORMAT_ERROR.value: Cash format error, please retype again.

LANG_IP_ERROR.value: The virtual credits service can't be activated because you haven't launched your chat room to the Internet yet.

LANG_ACTIVE_CREDITS_SERVICE.value: You can't login buychatcredits.com (BCC) to check credits change of your users and your commission, unless you're an 123FlashChat license or hosting buyer and you've activated the virtual credits service. The service is automatically available for free trial version users, but they have neither commission nor access to BCC.

LANG_ACTIVE_CREDIT_SERVICE_TO_LOGIN.value: You can't login buychatcredits.com to check credits change of your users and your commission, until you've activated the virtual credits service to acquire access account and password .

LANG_PPM_INSTRODUCTION.value: Activate the PPM/PPV mode so that users can't view a PPM/PPV video or enter a PPM/PPV room, until they pay credits, which is a great way to generate revenue for your website.

LANG_ROOM_CREDITS_HELP.value: Credits amount each time or minute, according to the choice of PPM Room Type.

LANG_GIFT_LOOP_HELP.value: Choose Small to show text notice only; Or choose Big to show gift thumbnail and text notice on the gifts rotating panel.

LANG_AUTO_PLAY_GIFT_TO_ME_HELP.value: The gifts will automatically play for the receivers.

LANG_AUTO_PLAY_GIFT_TO_OTHERS_HELP.value: The gifts will automatically play for others in the current chat room.

LANG_GIFT_CREDITS_HELP.value: The costs of credits to buy this gift.

LANG_CREDITS_SERVICE_CHANGE_SETTING_MESS.value: Settings updated successfully! Click following buttons to enter related panel to make changes.

LANG_ENABLE_EARN_CREDITS_SERVICE_HELP.value: After activation, users may earn credits by clicking ads, watching video, completing questionnaire and so on (offered by BCC Partners).

LANG_SOCIAL_CONNECT_INTRODUCTION.value: It allows users to login the chat room with their social accounts (Facebook, Twitter, Mesenger, Google, Yahoo), and enables account linking to get user's profile, to invite friends easily and so on.

LANG_AUTO_POPUP_INVITE_FRIENDS_HELP.value: Automatically pop up the Invite Friends panel when users login with their Facebook or Twitter accounts.

LANG_SOCIAL_CONNECT_LINK_SUBMIT_TICKET.value: Any question on Social Connect settings, please send a ticket for technical support.

LANG_GENERAL_MODE_HELP.value: The video of the publisher will play right after his/her video icon is clicked by the viewer.

LANG_REQUEST_MODE_HELP.value: The video of the publisher won't play until the publisher accepts the request from the viewer.

LANG_CONFERENCE_MODE_HELP.value: The video publisher has to push a button to talk unless the hands-free button is clicked, and he/she can be heard by everyone in the current room.

LANG_VIDEO_CONFERENCE_INTRODUCTION.value: Video publishers will become broadcasters, whose videos will automatically show at the top of the room and broadcast for everyone. This mode is ideal for virtual conference, webinar, etc.

LANG_MAX_VIDEO_NUM_HELP.value: The max number of viewed video windows per user, not including your own published video.

LANG_ENABLE_CREDITS_REWARDS.value: Enable credits rewards within the chat

LANG_PLUS_CREDITS_HELP.value: The required credits to get the Plus membership for one month. The Plus users, with a star icon and a unique username color (which can be configured in the admin panel), will be listed above the ordinary users while below the VIP and the Premium users in the user list.

LANG_PREMIUM_CREDITS_HELP.value: The required credits to get the Premium membership for one month. The Premium users, with a diamond icon and a unique username color (which can be configured in the admin panel), will be listed above the Plus and ordinary users while below the VIP users in the user list.

LANG_VIP_CREDITS_HELP.value: The required credits to get the VIP membership for one month. VIP users, with a crown icon and a unique username color (which can be configured in the admin panel), will be listed above the Premium, the Plus and the ordinary users in the user list.

LANG_REGISTER_CREDITS_REWARDS.value: The bonus credits received upon registration

LANG_ONLINE_CREDITS_REWARDS.value: The credits earned per minute from being online

LANG_ONLINE_CREDITS_REWARDS_HELP.value: The credits earned per minute from being online, except being away, busy or idle, which is also available to guest.

LANG_REGISTER_CREDITS_REWARDS_HELP.value: The bonus credits a user can earn upon his/her initial registration

LANG_ENABLE_CREDITS_REWARDS_HELP.value: Credit Rewards On/Off. Which can't be activated unless the Virtual Gifts or the PPM/PPV is enabled first.

LANG_ENABLE_UPGRADE_MEMBERSHIP_HELP.value: Enable/disable membership upgrades to add the user levels: VIP, Premium, Plus. Which can't be enabled unless the Credit Service is enabled first.

LANG_UPGRADE_MEMBERSHIP_INTRODUCTION.value: Various user levels (VIP, Premium, Plus) will be available after the membership upgrades system is enabled. In the user list, the users of higher levels will be listed above the ordinary users with some special icons and username colors. And it can't be enabled unless the Credit Service is enabled first.

LANG_CREDITS_REWARDS_INTRODUCTION.value: There are several ways for users to earn chat credits freely: Registering an account, being available online, or clicking ads of the third-parties (BCC partners).

LANG_USE_GLOBAL_VIDEO_MODE_HELP.value: The room video mode will sync with the global one.

LANG_ROOM_LOGO_INTRODUCTION.value: You can set your customized room logo here. Supported formats: JPEG, GIF and PNG. If animated GIF, only the first frame will show. And for PNG or GIF, please make sure the chat client and the logo are on the same domain. All pictures will be compressed within size 48pixel*48pixel.

LANG_MOBILE_APP_INTRODUCTION.value: 123 Flash Chat newly launches its mobile app for Android,which is a beautiful, powerful but easy multi-user video chat app. The mobile app is an efficient marketing tool for the chat room owner to promote the chat room to the millions of users, meanwhile, the chat users may explore thousands of video chat rooms with it, and never miss any fun! On the other hand, the app for iPhone, iPad and iTouch is ready too, only without the abilities to video chat and send picture.
